thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Kirstie

author: Kirstie
title: Kirstie
text: Came here looking for a vintage bike, found a lovely one on the cheaper side. Was disappointed with customer service, the young man was abrupt and seemed uninterested in a sale and I was advised to order online via their website (which I did, no issues with online purchase) I understand the store was busy that day and my potential spend was on the smaller side but still expect good service.
